Name: Image.Crop
Desc: Crops the image to a specified rectangle.
LongDesc: The Crop method extracts a rectangular region from the image, optionally preserving the drawing context. It creates a new canvas of the specified size and copies the selected area, supporting context preservation for advanced compositing.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 400, height: 300 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Crop(50, 50, 200, 100); });
